name: Two Worlds II: Velvet Game of the Year Edition
name_original: Two Worlds II: Velvet Game of the Year Edition
description:
Two Worlds II: Velvet Game of the Year Edition is an action-RPG game developed by Topware Interactive. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Reality Pump Studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Two Worlds II: Velvet Game of the Year Edition is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
